attributes.action: ban the publication of astrological "predictions" in UK newspapers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Astrological "predictions" or "the stars" are published in many UK newspapers on a daily basis. Such superstitious beliefs and pseudoscience have no place in a modern society, and astrologers have consistently failed empirical tests in controlled studies. Publishing their mumbo-jumbo in UK newspapers legitimizes their claims, and should therefore be disallowed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
